Package roles

Class ConstructionManager

java.lang.Object
core.Person
roles.ConstructionWorker
roles.ConstructionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPerson, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Architect
public class ConstructionManager
extends ConstructionWorker
Construction manager will hand out tasks to construction workers, which it got from the architect. This class has methods for managing, starting and cleaning up constructions. This class also has callback function from the construction worker and to the the architect and to the customer.
See Also:

    • notifyThatReady

      public void notifyThatReady​(ConstructionWorker workerReady, CustomProgressBar workingOnBar, CustomLabel workerName)
      Manage progress bars and hand out new tasks to workers, after they triggered this callback method. When no tasks are left, clean up the whole construction and the GUI.
      Parameters:
      workerReady - Who finished the task
      workingOnBar - What was this workers progressBar
      workerName - What was this workers label in the GUI
